duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Controller in managing the accounting and finance functions of the company
Prepare and analyze financial statements, including P&L, balance sheet, and cash flow statements
Ensure the accuracy and completeness of all financial reports and records
Manage accounts payable and accounts receivable processes
Reconcile bank and credit card statements
Assist with the annual audit and tax return preparation
Develop and implement financial controls and procedures to ensure compliance with GAAP and applicable laws and regulations
